name: Parth Vachhani
bio: Parth Vachhani is expecting to graduate from General Assembly in Janurary of 2024. Prior to that, he earned is undergraduate and graduate degrees in Biomedical Engineering from the New Jersey Institute of Techonology in 2019 and 2022 respectively. After spending 3 years in the medical device industry, Parth decided to make a career change into software engineering afte discovering a deep fascination with the programming involved to make these devices work as intended. He is currently looking for a full-time position as a software engineer.
